long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Extension Helps you take screenshot of YouTube video. So you can make faster notes while studying

To use the extension, add it, then pin it to the toolbar. Each time you click on the icon, you will be able to take screenshot while watching a video.

1.) Pause the video
2.) Click on icon
3.) Click on Download
and that's it  it will take a screenshot
